description:
A succession of accidents occurs during construction at Inba Swamp. It is rumored to be the work of a fiend called a black goblin. A youth named Tasaku comes to Edo to get the construction halted. Yukiatsu encounters a Youi that turns people into toads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Official Construction in Old Canal of Inba Marsh
印旛沼古堀筋御普請(いんばぬまふるぼりすじごふしん)
